FCC_EVENT_SOURCING_SPINE.description: Shadow Ledger backbone with time-travel replay support

adr_compliance.ADR-001: Agent authority boundaries observed, not modified
adr_compliance.ADR-013: Data sourced from canonical tables only
adr_compliance.ADR-019: Human interaction layer provided for CEO

architecture_adherence.description: Total transparency without friction. Dashboard observes but does not modify system behavior. All data flows are unidirectional: Database -> Dashboard -> CEO Vision.

conclusion: Phase I of FjordHQ Command Center (FCC) has been successfully implemented per CEO Directive 2026. The Glass Wall foundation view is operational at /fcc, providing CEO visibility into all ADRs, IoS modules, agent activity, and governance deviations. Event sourcing backbone, entropy collector, and alpha graph engine shell are ready for Phase II integration.
